name: 顧寶鼎
objective:
1. 離岸風機設計流程及通論，2. 國際離岸風電工程認證流程及規格，3. 固定式離岸風機結構設計介紹，4. 設計準則，強度，疲勞，服務，意外極限，5. 固定式離岸風場實例，6. 設計風力及波浪力，7. 設計地震力，8. 離岸風機設計流程詳論，9. 結構桿件設計，10. 套筒結點及灌漿結點設計 11. 金屬疲勞計算及設計 12. 施工，運送及安裝

1. Offshore wind turbine (OWT) design overview, 2. Certification for offshore wind farms, 3. Design of OWT fixed foundation, 4. Design limit states: ultimate, fatigue, serviceability and accidental, 5. Examples of worldwide offshore wind farms, 6. Wind load and wave load, 7, Seismic load, 8. Detailed discussions of OWT designs, 9. Structural member design, 10. Tubular joint and grouted connection design, 11. Fatigue design, 12. Fabrication, transportation and installation
schedule:
Week 1 離岸風場設計通論 (1), OWT design overview (1)
Week 2 離岸風場設計通論 (2), OWT design overview (2)
Week 3 海氣象及風力計算 (1), Metocean and wind load calculations (1)
Week 4 海氣象及風力計算 (2), Metocean and wind load calculations (2)
Week 5 強度，疲勞，服務，意外極限，Ultimate/fatigue/serviceability/accidental limit states
Week 6 結構及超元素模擬，Structural modeling and super-element
Week 7 設計波浪力及地震力，Wave and seismic loads
Week 8 工程製造，Manufacturing and fabrication
Week 9 期中考，Midterm exam
Week 10 工程參訪，Site visit
Week 11 設計力總表，Design load summary table
Week 12 結構桿件設計，Structural member design
Week 13 結構接頭設計，Structural joint design
Week 14 離岸風場安裝，Transportation and installation
Week 15 期末報告 (1), Final project presentation (1)
Week 16 期末報告 (2), Final project presentation (2)
scorePolicy:
出席率，Attendance 15%
上課問答，Class Q&A 15%
期中考，Mid-term 35%
期末報告，Final project presentation 35%
materials:
References:
1. S. Bhattacharya, "Design of Foundations for Offshore Wind Turbines", Wiley, 2019.
2. T. Burton, D. Sharpe, N. Jenkins, E. Bossanyi, "Wind Energy Handbook", Wiley, 2001.
3. DNV-ST-0126, "Support structures for wind turbines", 2021.
4. IEC 61400-3-1, "Design requirements for fixed offshore wind turbines", 2019.
